@hi_bz @eleven_ty @contentful I've enjoyed making sites with @contentful, and with @eleven_ty... I've not yet combined them. The model is popular though - pull data during your build, then use it in templates. @eleven_ty makes it very nice to get data for the build. I use it here: https://t.co/6gmBjfXzpv
